attributes.action: Reopen the bus stop at fishermans walk in Fleetwood UK
attributes.background:
We want the bus stop at fisherman's walk to be reopened so it's easier for people to access both bus and trams.

It was apparently closed due to the new gym so clients could park there but yet the gym have their own car park.

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
